name: HalisWorld
description: What is the project about? Halisworld is a virtual reality platform powered by Binance blockchain. Users can create, experience, and monetize content and applications. Halisworld is a fantasy world in metaverse. Mixing dreams with reality and making a new world. Contents can range from static 3D scenes to interactive systems such as games.
